definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drive out, cast out (NH id., Aram. [[גְּרַשׁ]] Pa. Ithp. of divorce, MI:19 [[ויגרשה]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּגְרְשׁוּ]] Is 57:20; Inf. sf. [[מִגְרָשָׁהּ]] Ez Eze 36:5 infr.; Pt. act. [[גּׁרֵשׁ]] Ex 34:11; pass. f. [[גְּרוּשָׁה]] Le 21:7 + 4 t.;—cast our, thrust out, ´[[י]], the Amorites Ex 34:11 (JE; c. [[מִפְּנֵי]]); waters, mire and dirt [[רֶפֶשׁ]] [[וׇטִיט]] Is 57:20; pass. only of divorced woman Le 21:7 (sq. [[מֵאִישָׁהּ]]; elsewh. with [[אַלְמָנׇה]] widow), v:Le 21:14, Le 22:13 (all H), Nu 30:10 (P) Ez Eze 44:22. On [[מִגְרָשָׁהּ]] Ez Eze 36:5 as Aram. Inf. cf. Ges:§ 45 1. c. Kö:i 166; Co del., on intern. grounds, cf. LXX

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִגְרָָשׁ]] Is 57:20; 3 fs. [[וְנִגְרְשָׁה]] consec. Am 8:8; [[נִגְרַשְׁתִּי]] Jon 2:5; —be driven away, sq. [[מִנֶּגֶד עֵינֶיךָ]], i.e. from the presence of Yahweh Jon 2:5; be driven, tossed, as the Nile Am 8:8; of the sea Is 57:20 rel. cl., [[אֲשֶׁר]] om., like the sea that is tossed.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[וְגֵרְשָׁה]] consec. Ex 23:28; [[גֵּרַשְׁתָּ]] Ge 4:14, sf. 3 mpl. [[וְגֵרַשְׁתָּמוֹ]] consec. Ex 23:31; [[וְגֵרַשְׁתִּ֫י]] Ex 33:2, sf. [[גֵּרַשְׁתִּיהוּ]] Ez Eze 31:11 (so Targum Vulgate, not LXX; cf. Co's conj.); [[וְגֵּרַשְׁתִּיו]] consec. Nu 22:11; 3 pl. sf. [[גֵּרְשׁוּנִי]] 1Sa 26:19; Impf. [[יְגׇרֵשׁ]] Ex 11:1, [[וַיְגׇ֫רֶשׁ]] Ge 3:24 + 6 t.; sf. [[וַיְגׇרֲשֵׁהוּ]] Ps 34:1, [[יְגׇֽרֲשֵׁם]] Ex 6:1; 2 ms. [[תְּגׇרֵשׁ]] Ps 80:9, [[וַתְּגׇ֫רֶשׁ]] Jos 24:12; [[אֲגׇרֵשׁ]] Ju Jdg 2:3, [[וׇֽאֲגׇרֵשׁ]] Ju Jdg 6:9; sf. 3 ms. [[אֲגׇֽרְשֶׁנּוּ]] Ex 23:29, Ex 23:30, Nu 22:6; [[אֲגׇֽרֲשֵׁם]] Ho 9:15; [[וַיְגׇֽרֲשׁוּ]] Ju Jdg 11:2; [[יְגַֽשׂרשׁוּהַ]] Zep 2:4, [[וַיְגׇֽרֲשׁוּם]] Ex 2:17; 2 mpl. [[תְּגׇֽרֲשׁוּן]] Mic 2:9, [[וַתְּגׇֽרֲשׁוּנִי]] Ju Jdg 11:7; Inf. cstr. [[לְגׇרֵשׁ]] 1Ch 17:21 + ‖ 2Sa 7:23 Gei We Dr, for MT [[לארחך]]; [[לְגׇֽרֲשֵׁנוּ]] 2Ch 20:11; abs. id. Ex 11:1; Imv. [[גׇּרֵשׁ]] Ge 21:10, Pr 22:10; —drive out, away, Hex all JE, incl. poem De 33; (´[[י]] subj.), Adam fr. garden Ge 3:24 cf. Cain Ge 4:14 (sq. [[מִן]] loc., & so 21 t.), David (men subj.) 1Sa 26:19, id. (Abimelech subj.) Ps 34:1 (title), Hagar (Abr. subj.) Ge 21:10 cf. scorner, Pr 22:10 daughters of Reuel (subj. shepherds) Ex 2:17; Moses and Aaron fr. Pharaoh's presence (indef. subj.) Ex 10:11; Gaal etc. (subj. Zebul) Ju Jdg 9:41 (sq. [[מִן]] c. Inf.), Jephthah (Gil. subj.) Ju Jdg 11:2, Jdg 11:7; Abiathar (subj. Sol.) 1Ki 2:27 (sq. [[מִן]] c. Inf.) wicked fr. temple (´[[י]] subj.) Ho 9:15; women fr. houses (nobles subj.) Mic 2:9; oft. of Canaanites (hornet subj.) Ex 23:28, Jos 24:12 cf. Ex 23:31 (Israel subj.); also (´[[י]] subj.; cf. MI:19) Ex 23:29, Ex 23:30, Ex 33:2, De 33:27, Jos 24:l8, Ju Jdg 2:3, Jdg 6:9, Ps 78:55, Ps 80:9, 1Ch 17:21; of Israel from Egypt (subj. Pharaoh) Ex 6:1, Ex 11:1, Ex 11:1; from land of Moab (subj. Balak) Nu 22:6, Nu 22:11; Judah from Canaan (subj. Moab & Ammon) 2Ch 20:11; Egypt from her land (´[[י]] subj.) Ez Eze 31:11 (but cf. text, supr.); Ashdod (indef. subj.) Zep 2:4. †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גּׁרְשׁוּ]] subj. Israelites Ex 12:39; Impf. [[יְגׁרָָשׁוּ]] subj. despised and miserable outcasts Job 30:5 both sq. [[מִן]] loc.
